plan.text: Set up a daily scheduled task to run at 9am UTC
Fetch top AI trending articles from reliable sources
Summarize the articles into a concise thread format
Post the summary thread as a tweet
Log the activity and article details to Google Sheets

questions.label: Which sources would you like to fetch AI trending articles from?
How many tweets would you like in the summary thread?

discoveries.title: A scheduling service is required to run the task daily at 9am UTC
AI-powered summarization may be needed for efficient article processing
